definitions.definition: The tree of the species Citrus paradisi , a hybrid of Citrus maxima and sweet orange .
The large spherical tart fruit produced by this tree.
Large breasts ; by extension, a woman with large breasts.
examples: Cupping her grapefruits in her hands, she closed her eyes and imagined her date grasping them, exploring their size, weight, and firmness.

main_definition: The tree of the species Citrus paradisi , a hybrid of Citrus maxima and sweet orange .
secondary_definitions: The large spherical tart fruit produced by this tree.
( vulgar , usually in the plural ) Large breasts ; by extension, a woman with large breasts.
